title: upload major releases to ibiblio
description:
i'm a current user of maven and the latest 1.9 and 2.0 releases are not available on ibiblio.
http://www.ibiblio.org/maven2/lucene/lucene/

Could someone upload the latest versions so that use maven-heads can access the new features?

comments.content:
This seems to be a duplicate of LUCENE-551. The releases are available at:

    http://www.ibiblio.org/maven2/org/apache/lucene/lucene-core/
comments.author: Jukka Zitting
